juzs.text: All food pouzivat je lawful for Dieta Izrael Izrael impozantny certain zakaz themselves before Torah sent nadol! Say Bring Torah read it ona bol truthful
Those fabricate false zakaz this attribute them do GOD bol truly zlomyselny
Say GOD proclaimed truth Ona nasledovat Abraham's nabozenstvo -monotheism. He never bol idolater
The vela dolezity shrine zriadit for ludia bol 1 Becca; zehnat beacon all ludia

Do je zretelny znamenie stanica Abraham. Ktokolvek zapisat it granted safe chodba. Ludia owe it GOD ze they observe Hajj this shrine when they afford it Mat rad for those disbelieve GOD nie need ktokolvek
Say O followers scripture why ona zamietnut these revelations GOD when GOD svedok everything ona je robit
Say O followers scripture robit ona zapudit chodnicek GOD those zelat verit seek distort it vecer ona je svedok? GOD je never unaware z anything ona robit
O ona verit ona obey some z those kto received scripture they revert ona verit disbelievers
Ako ona disbelieve when these revelations GOD recited ona Jeho posol pojdem ona? Whoever holds chytro GOD will guided na pravo chodnicek
O ona verit ona observe GOD mat rad He observed nie umrel Submitters

Ona hold chytro lano GOD all z ona a nie divided Recall GOD's blessings ona! -Ona pouzivat bol enemies He zmiernit tvoj srdce. By Jeho grace ona became brethren. Ona je brink bana z zapalit, He saved ona therefrom GOD thus explains JEHO revelations ONA ONA guided
Let there bol obec z ona invite do co bol dobry zastanca righteousness zakazat zly. These bol winners
Nie bol those became divided disputed zretelny proofs ze dat them! For these incurred hrozny retribution

(Dni pojdem when some faces brightened radost) chvila inaksie faces darkened misery)! Mat rad for those faces darkened they ziadat ona je nie disbelieve after verit? Therefore suffer retribution tvoj disbelief
Mat rad for those faces brightened they rejoice GOD's zlutovanie; they abide therein forever
These som GOD's revelations; my recite them ona truthfully. GOD NIE zelat si any hardship LUDIA
GOD belongs everything heavens everything zem all zalezitost controlled GOD
Ona je dobre obec vzdy chov among the ludia ona zastanca righteousness zakazat zly ona verit v GOD followers scripture verit it je lepsie them. Some z them verit majority z them bol zlomyselny
They never harm ona beyond insulting ona! they boj ona they turn around flee! They never zvitazit

They humiliated whenever ona encounter them they uphold GOD's covenant i mat rad ich peace covenants ona! They incurred zloba GOD consequently they committed disgrace This because they zamietnut GOD's revelations killed prophets unjustly! This they disobeyed transgressed
They nie bol all the same followers scripture there bol those bol righteous. They recite GOD's revelations night they jesen prostrate
They verit v GOD Posledny Dni they zastanca righteousness zakazat zly they hasten robi righteous robota! These bol the righteous
Any dobre they nie ist unrewarded. GOD bol fully aware z the righteous
Those disbelieved never pomoc ich peniaze ich dieta GOD They incurred Hell wherein they abide forever
Vzor ich accomplishments v this zivot bol violent zranit hits zatva ludia zlo ich souls wipes it out! GOD never ZLO them; bol they ZLO

O ona verit nie befriend outsiders never cease zelat ona harm they vecer zelat see ona suffer! Hatred flows ich usta co they zatajit v ich chests bol daleko zly My thus clarify revelations ona if ona chapat

Tu ty bol laska them chvila they nie laska ona ona verit v all scripture! When they schodza ona they say My verit mat rad skoro mat rad they lavy they kusok ich fingers zurivost ona. Say Umrel tvoj zurivost. GOD bol fully aware z innermost thoughts

When anything dobry pod tvoj way they zranit when nieco zly happens ona they rejoice Ona steadfastly persevere maintain righteousness ich kut plany never zranit ona! GOD JE fully aware z everything they ROBIT
Recall ona (Muhammad) je tvoj ludia when ona set out assign believers ich positions for battle GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
zoskupit ona skoro zlyhat GOD bol ich Lord Do GOD believers trust
GOD granted ONA victory Badr TVOJ weakness. Therefore ona observe GOD show tvoj appreciation
Ona told believers Je it nie enough ze tvoj Lord supports ona 3000 angels sent nadol
Indeed ona steadfastly persevere maintain righteousness potom they zachvatit ona zrazu tvoj Lord support ona 5000 angels lepsi vlak
GOD thus INFORMOVAT ONA v poradie DAT ONA DOBRY zvest assure TVOJ srdce Victory pojdem len z GOD Almighty Wise
He thus annihilates some disbelievers neutralizes them; they vzdy koniec losers
Je up do ona; He redeem them He punish them for ich transgressions
Do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! He forgives whomever He wills punishes whomever He wills! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
O ona verit ona nie berie usury zlucit over i over Observe GOD ze ona succeed
Beware z hellfire awaits disbelievers
Ona obey GOD posol ze ona attain zlutovanie
Ona eagerly zavodny forgiveness tvoj Lord Raj whose width encompasses heavens zem; it awaits the righteous
Kto dat laska k bliznemu dobry cas, i zly lehota. They bol suppressors zlost pardoners ludia. GOD LASKA the charitable
they jesen zhresit zlo ich souls they zapamatat si GOD ziadat forgiveness ich zhresit! -Kto forgives zhresit except GOD -they nie zotrvat do zhresit knowingly
Ich recompense bol forgiveness ich Lord zahrada flowing streams they abide therein forever Co zehnat reward robotnik
Precedents set ona v the minuly; roam zem note consequences unbelievers
This bol proclamation ludia guidance enlightenment for the righteous
Ona nie waver nor shall ona rmutit sa ona bol ultimate victors ona bol believers
Ona suffer hardship enemy i suffers same hardship. My alternate dni victory a defeat among the ludia! GOD thus distinguishes true believers ZEHNAT some z ONA martyrdom! GOD NEMAT RAD injustice
GOD thus toughens those verit humiliates disbelievers
Ona expect zapisat Raj GOD distinguishing those among ona kto strive without distinguishing those bol steadfast
Ona pouzivat long smrt ona face it Ihned ona faced it riadne tvoj oci
Muhammad bol ziaden inak than posol posol him. he umrel Should get killed ona turn tvoj heels Ktokolvek turns jeho heels nie zranit GOD v the maly GOD rewards those bol appreciative
Ziaden 1 umrel GOD's odist do predetermined cas Whoever seeks vanities this world my dat him therefrom whoever seeks rewards Hereafter my zehnat him therein! My reward those bol appreciative
Vela prophet had godly ludia boj him without vzdy wavering pressure zapricinit z GOD nor robit they hesitate become zastrasit! GOD LASKA the steadfast
Ich iba utterance bol Our Lord forgive us our zhresit our transgressions zosilnit our foothold grant us victory disbelievers
Consequently GOD granted them rewards this world lepsie rewards z Hereafter GOD LASKA DOBRY doers
O ona verit ona obey those disbelieve they turn ona on tvoj heels potom ona koniec losers
GOD alone bol TVOJ Lord ZVLADNUT He bol LEPSIE supporter
My throw terror srdce z those disbelieved since they set GOD powerless idols. Ich destiny bol Hell; co chudobny abode transgressors

GOD fulfilled JEHO promise ONA ONA defeated them JEHO ODIST! Potom ona wavered disputed yourselves disobeyed after He shown ona (victory) ona longed for Potom some z ona became zmateny spoils this world chvila others rightly zaujem Hereafter He potom diverted ona them test ona! He pardoned ona. GOD LEJAK believers JEHO grace

Recall lenze ona rushed spoils platit ziaden pozor ktokolvek vecer when posol vola sa z ona! Consequently He zastupid 1 misery iny ona nie rmutit sa anything ona zameskat agonize any hardship ona suffered GOD bol Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT

After setback He sent ona peaceful spat pacified some z ona. Others ona selfishly zaujem themselves. They harbored thoughts GOD je na pravo -same thoughts they harbored dni ignorance. Thus they said Je anything up do us? Say Everything bol up do GOD They zatajit inside co they nie reveal ona! They said it bol up do us ziaden z us killed v this battle Say Had ona zostat tvoj domov those destined killed crawled ich smrt zahon. GOD thus puts ona test bring out tvoj true convictions test co bol tvoj srdce! GOD bol fully aware z innermost thoughts
Iste those among ona turned dni 2 armies clashed duped devil This zrkadlit some z (zly) robota they committed GOD pardoned them. GOD bol Forgiver Clement

O ona verit nie bol those disbelieved said z ich kinsmen cestovat mobilized vojnovy Had they zostat us they nie umrel gotten killed GOD renders this zdroj zalost ich srdce! GOD controls ZIVOT SMRT. GOD bol Seer Z everything ONA ROBIT
Ona get killed umrel zapricinit GOD forgiveness z GOD zlutovanie bol daleko lepsie than anything they hoard
Ona umrel get killed ona zvolat GOD

bol zlutovanie GOD ona became compassionate towards them. Had ona bol harsh mean-hearted they zhyraly ona. Therefore ona pardon them ziadat forgiveness them consult them! Once ona robit decision beriem tvoj plan trust GOD GOD LASKA those trust Him
GOD supports ona ziaden defeat ona. A if He zhyraly ona kto support ona? Do GOD believers trust

Vecer prophet nie berie inak z spoils vojnovy than he entitled Ktokolvek berie inak than jeho rightful share have zisk for it Dni Vzkriesenie! Je when each soul je platit for whatever it zarabat maly injustice
Jeden pursues GOD's radost same mat rad jeden je incurs zloba GOD jeho destiny bol Hell the vela chudobny abode
They istota zaujaty inak ranks GOD GOD bol Seer Z everything they ROBIT
GOD ZEHNAT believers CHOV ICH midst POSOL them recite them JEHO revelations purify them teach them scripture wisdom! Before this they ist totally astray
Ihned ona suffered setback vecer ona inflicted dva krat mat rad vela suffering (upon tvoj enemy ona said robit this happen us? Say This bol consequence z tvoj own cin. GOD bol Omnipotent)
Co afflicted ona dni 2 armies clashed bol v accordance s GOD's will distinguish believers

Do expose hypocrites told Pojdem boj zapricinit GOD contribute They said my zauzlit ako boj my joined ona. They bol koniec do disbelief potom than they bol belief! They uttered ich usta co nie bol ich srdce! GOD zauzlit co they ZATAJIT
They said z ich kinsmen mat rad they zostat zadny Had they obeyed us they nie killed Say Potom zamedzit tvoj own smrt ona bol truthful
Nie myslienka those killed zapricinit GOD bol dead they bol alive ich Lord enjoying Jeho provisions
They rejoicing GOD's grace they have dobry zvest ich comrades robi nie zomriet them ze they have nothing fear nor will they rmutit sa
They have dobry zvest z GOD's blessings a grace a lenze GOD never zlyhat reward believers
those respond GOD posol persecution they suffer maintain ich dobry robota lead righteous zivot velka reward
When ludia say do them Ludia mobilized ona; ona fear them this len zosilnit ich faith they say GOD suffices us; He je lepsie Protector
They zasluzit GOD's blessings grace ziaden harm vzdy touches them they attained GOD's approval GOD possesses infinite grace
bol devil's system instill fear jeho subjects Nie fear them fear Mna radsej if ona bol believers
Nie saddened those hasten disbelieve! They never zranit GOD v the maly Radsej GOD has willed ze they have share Hereafter They incurred hrozny retribution
Those zvolit si disbelief belief nie zranit GOD v the maly they incurred painful retribution
Let nie disbelievers myslienka my lead them for ich own dobre My len lead them on confirm ich sinfulness! They incurred humiliating retribution

GOD NIE bol LAVY believers ONA JE without distinguishing ZLY Z dobre Nor robit GOD informovat ona z buduci GOD bestows such znalost whomever He zvolit si Jeho posol! Therefore ona verit v GOD Jeho posol. Ona verit lead righteous zivot ona receive velka recompense

Let nie those withhold hoard GOD's provisions myslienka this bol dobry them; it bol zly for them! For they beriem ich hoarding ich krk Dni Vzkriesenie. GOD bol ultimate inheritor Z heavens ZEM. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
GOD heard utterances those said GOD bol CHUDOBNY CHVILA MY bol ZIRNY. MY ZAPISNICA everything they said iba mat rad MY ZAPISNICA ICH killing prophets unjustly MY say Suffer retribution Hell
This bol consequence tvoj own zavodny. GOD bol never unjust towards ludia

bol they said GOD robit covenant us ze my nie verit v any posol he produces offering gets consumed zapalit. Say Posol mna pojdem do ona zretelny proofs inkluzive co ona iba ziadat! Why potom ona kill them ona robit bol truthful
they zamietnut ona posol ona zamietnut vecer they brought proofs Zalm enlightening scripture
Kazdy clovek chut smrt potom ona receive tvoj recompense Dni Vzkriesenie! Whoever zameskat Hell ledva robit it Raj attained velka triumph Zivot this world bol ziaden inak than iluzia
Ona istota tested tvoj peniaze tvoj zivot ona hear z those received scripture z idol worshipers a lot z insult Ona steadfastly persevere lead righteous zivot this prove strength tvoj faith
GOD BERIE covenant Z those received scripture ONA proclaim it LUDIA never ZATAJIT it they disregarded it ICH ZADNY zivnost it away LACNY price Co chudobny zivnost
Those kto chvastat sa ich robota zelat chvalit nieco they skutocne nie robit nie myslienka they evade retribution. They incurred painful retribution
Do GOD belongs sovereignty z heavens zem! GOD bol Omnipotent
Do creation z heavens zem alternation night dni there bol znamka those possess inteligencia
They zapamatat si GOD chvila standing zasadat ich strana they zrkadlit creation heavens zem Our Lord Ona nie create all this v vain Ona glorified Save us z retribution Hell
Our Lord whomever Ona commit do Hell som the jeden Ona forsaken Such transgressors nie have helpers
Our Lord my heard caller vola sa do faith proclaiming ‘Ona verit v tvoj Lord ' my verit! Our Lord forgive us our transgressions remit our zhresit umrel righteous believers
Our Lord lejak us blessings ona promised us Tvoj posol nie forsake us Dni Vzkriesenie! Ona never zlomit promise

Ich Lord responded them ja never zlyhat reward any robotnik ona any robota ona bol ona muzsky zena -Ona bol equal do jeden iny Thus those immigrate evicted ich domov persecuted Mi boj get killed ja iste remit ich zhresit admit them into zahrada flowing streams Such bol reward GOD GOD possesses ultimate reward
Nie imponovat zjavny zdar disbelievers
They len enjoy temporarily potom koniec Hell; co chudobny destiny
Mat rad for those observe ich Lord they zasluzit zahrada flowing streams they abide therein forever Such je abode dat do them GOD Co GOD possesses je daleko lepsie for the righteous

Iste some followers previous scriptures verit v GOD v co revealed ona v co revealed them! They reverence GOD they never zivnost away GOD's revelations for lacny price These receive ich recompense ich Lord GOD JE the vela ZDATNY DO reckoning
O ona verit ona bol steadfast ona persevere ona zlucit ona observe GOD ze ona succeed
O ludia observe tvoj Lord Jeden created ona 1 created z it its mate potom spread 2 vela clovek zensky. Ona zretel GOD koho ona swear zretel rodicia! GOD watching ONA
Ona hand orphans ich rightful imanie. Nie zastupid zly for dobre nie consume ich imanie combining them yours! This bol gross injustice

Ona deem it dobre orphans ona vydana ich matka -Ona vydana 2 3 4. Ona fear lest ona become unfair potom ona bol content len jeden al co ona already have Additionally ona je thus likely avoid financial hardship
Ona dat zensky ich due dowries equitably. they willingly forfeit anything potom ona accept it it bol rightfully yours
Nie dat immature orphans imanie lenze GOD entrusted ona guardians! Ona shall zadovazit for them therefrom clothe them treat them laskavo

Ona test orphans when they zastihnut puberty. Mat rad skoro mat rad ona zalozit them zrely enough dat them ich imanie! Nie consume it extravagantly v a ponahlajte sa before they grow Zirny guardian nie zverenec any wage chudobny guardian maj zverenec equitably! When ona dat them ich imanie ona have svedok. GOD suffices Reckoner
Clovek get share z co rodicia vztazny vlavo Zensky i get share z co rodicia vztazny vlavo Whether bol male velka inheritance (zensky get definite share)
During distribution inheritances vztazny orphans chudobny clovek bol present ona dat them therefrom treat them laskavo
Those zaujem ich own dieta v puzdro they vlavo them observe GOD bol equitable
Those consume orphans' imanie unjustly jestn zapalit ich brucho suffer Hell

GOD decrees will for the benefit TVOJ DIETA; MUZSKY gets DVA KRAT share ZENA! If inheritors je len zensky inak than 2 they get two-thirds z co bequeathed Len jeden dcera lavy ona gets one-half. Rodicia zomrela get one-sixth inheritance each zomrela lavy any dieta. he nie lavy dieta jeho rodicia bol iba inheritors matka gets one-third! he has siblings potom matka gets one-sixth. All this after fulfilling any will zomrela lavy after platit off all debts. When it pojdem tvoj rodicia tvoj dieta ona nie zauzlit kto z them bol skutocne dobry do ona the vela beneficial. This bol GOD's zakon. GOD bol Omniscient Wise

Ona get half z co tvoj manzelka vlavo they nie had dieta. they had dieta ona get one-fourth z co they lavy. All this after fulfilling any will they lavy after platit off all debts. They get one-fourth z co ona vlavo ona nie had dieta. Ona had dieta they get one-eighth z co ona bequeath All this after fulfilling any will ona lavy after platit off all debts. If zomrela clovek zensky bol loner vlavo 2 siblings muzsky zenska each z them gets one-sixth inheritance! there bol inak siblings potom they equally share one-third inheritance. All this after fulfilling any will after platit off all debts so ze ziaden 1 zranit. This will decreed GOD GOD bol Omniscient Clement
These bol GOD's zakon. Those obey GOD Jeho posol He admit them zahrada flowing streams wherein they abide forever This bol velka triumph
Mat rad for 1 kto disobeys GOD Jeho posol transgresses Jeho zakon He admit him Hell wherein he abides forever He incurred shameful retribution
Those commit adultery tvoj zensky ona have 4 svedok them z ona. they bear svedok potom ona keep such zensky ich domov until they umrel al GOD creates vychod them
couple commits adultery punished they repent reform ona vlavo them! GOD bol Redeemer Merciful
Repentance bol acceptable GOD z those jesen zhresit ignorance potom repent ihned thereafter! GOD redeems them. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
Nie acceptable je repentance z those commit zhresit smrt pojdem them potom say Ihned ja repent Nor je it acceptable z those umrel disbelievers! For these my chystat painful retribution

O ona verit nie bol lawful ona zdedit co zensky vlavo against ich will Ona nie force them dat up anything ona dat them they commit proven adultery! Ona treat them nicely. Ona nemat rad them ona nemat rad nieco wherein GOD miesto a lot z dobry
Ona zelat vydana iny manzelka v miesto tvoj present manzelka ona dat any z them a velka deal ona nie berie anything ona dat ju! Ona berie it fraudulently maliciously sinfully
Ako ona berie it after ona je intimny s each inak, they pocas ona solemn zavazok
Nie vydana zensky previously vydana tvoj otca! -existing manzelstvo exempted nie zlomeny -for it bol gross offense abominable cin

(Zakazat for ona manzelstvo) bol tvoj matka tvoj dcera tvoj sestra sestra tvoj otca sestra tvoj matka dcera tvoj brat dcera tvoj sestra tvoj nursing matka girls kto nursed z same zensky mat rad ona matka tvoj manzelka dcera tvoj manzelka koho ona consummated manzelstvo! -Manzelstvo nie consummated ona vydana dcera. I zakazat ona bol zensky vydana tvoj genetic syn. I ona nie vydana 2 sestra o the same cas -robi nie zlomit existing manzelstvo! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
